titleStmt.title: An answer to several passages, citations or charges in a book lately publish'd by F. Bugg styled New Rome arraigned, &c. Being a short vindication of the Christian believers of Jesus of Nazareth, who are in derision termed Quakers, from the said aspersions
titleStmt.author: S. D.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Bugg, Francis. New Rome arraigned.
Caption title on p. 2 reads: An answer to several charges of Francis Bugg.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
